Uses of Interface
com.dhemery.core.Feature

  • Packages that use Feature 
    Package Description
    com.dhemery.configuring
    Translate configuration options to and from various representations.
    com.dhemery.core
    Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions.
    com.dhemery.expressing
    Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.
    com.dhemery.polling
    Evaluate conditions repeatedly.
    com.dhemery.strings
    Operate on strings and translate them to other types.

    • Uses of Feature in com.dhemery.configuring

      Methods in com.dhemery.configuring with parameters of type Feature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T Configuration.option(Feature<String,T> translator, String name, UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
      Return the value of the named option, transformed by the operators and translated by the translator.
      <T> T TransformingConfiguration.option(Feature<String,T> translator, String name, UnaryOperator<String>... queryOperators)
      Return the value of the named option, transformed by the configuration and query operators, and translated by the translator
